CVE-2018-17199.summary: In Apache HTTP Server 2.4 release 2.4.37 and prior, mod_session checks the session expiry time before decoding the session. This causes session expiry time to be ignored for mod_session_cookie sessions since the expiry time is loaded when the session is decoded.

CVE-2018-17189.summary: In Apache HTTP server versions 2.4.37 and prior, by sending request bodies in a slow loris way to plain resources, the h2 stream for that request unnecessarily occupied a server thread cleaning up that incoming data. This affects only HTTP/2 (mod_http2) connections.

CVE-2019-0190.summary: A bug exists in the way mod_ssl handled client renegotiations. A remote attacker could send a carefully crafted request that would cause mod_ssl to enter a loop leading to a denial of service. This bug can be only triggered with Apache HTTP Server version 2.4.37 when using OpenSSL version 1.1.1 or later, due to an interaction in changes to handling of renegotiation attempts.

  • Our Team
   
DDA Consulting International work with leaders and managers who need to improve business performance or
bring about significant organisational change. We work in EMEA, AMER and APAC.

Our core business is the design and delivery of learning and development solutions that make immediate and lasting improvements in performance and enable significant organisational change.

Specialists in the experiential approach to learning, our particular focus is the practical and direct application of skills towards the achievement of the organisation’s goals and objectives.
 
  
Open Personal Leadership & Influence Programme
Charingworth Manor
 
9th - 11th July 2019

Improving Business Performance.

Leadership and Management training programmes, designed to meet the specific needs of client organisations, form a major part of our portfolio.

Our experiential approach to learning is often at the heart of these programmes, together with targeted facilitation, team workshops and executive coaching programmes. Read more... 

Transforming Your Organisation.

Leading your organisation through a significant change is always challenging. At DDA Consulting International we work closely with our clients to help them:
  • Create a compelling vision for the future and win the support of key stakeholders
  • Devise a strategy for implementing the change
  • Establish processes and procedures to implement and imbed the change
  • Align leaders, managers and staff and ensure that their behaviour enables and encourages the change
Read more...
